Business Name: The Denture Place or Woodlawn Dental

Business Information: The Dentistry practice of Dr. Keyvan Soleymani, DMD is a family owned and operated practice in Birmingham, Alabama. Offering high quality preventative and cosmetic dental care for the entire family we take pride in running an established practice with a diverse environment. With our dentist being in practice for over 25 years, you can rest easy knowing your dental care is in good hands. Our proof is in our longevity in the industry! Dr. Keyvan Soleymani, DMD grew up and graduated in Florence, AL. where he did his under grad work at the University of North Alabama. Dr. Keyvan Soleymani, DMD then went on to do his graduate work at the School of Denistry - University of Alabama, Birmingham, where he got his DMD degree. Dr. Keyvan Soleymani, DMD has specialized in the following areas of Dentistry for the last 25 years:

Dr. McMillan combines state-of-the-art technology & the most innovative, minimally invasive new procedures available. He is licensed by the Dental Board of Alabama & is a member of the American Dental Association.

We make high quality dental care convenient and affordable at our Vital Smiles office located near you. Our friendly and experienced dental professionals provide a wide range of family dental services including orthodontics, cosmetic dentistry and emergency dental care. Our general dentists, specialists and hygienists are all under one roof. Which means that treatment for implants, braces, or periodontal care can take place in the same office. Here, we gladly treat patients of all ages, including young children. We also welcome walk-ins, offer evening and weekend appointments, and accept a variety of dental plans including Medicaid and ALL Kids. FREE exams and x-rays for new patients.

Alabama Dental Associates is a full-service clinic located in Irondale, Ala. It offers oral hygiene care, dental cleaning, sealants, bonding, fillings, sedation dentistry, crowns/bridges, tooth extractions, wisdom tooth extractions, root canal treatment and dental implants. In addition, it offers dentures, nightguards/mouthguards, tooth whitening, orthodontics/retainers, veneers/lumineers, X-rays and computerized shade matching. In addition to this, Alabama Dental Associates performs tooth extraction due to severe decay and treats advanced periodontal diseases, infections, orthodontic corrections, fractured teeth/roots. Some of the orthodontic braces available include Damon bracket, ceramic tooth colored bracket, clear braces and metal braces.

Gooch Family Dental in Birmingham is led by Burton Gooch, DDS. Our dentists offers general, cosmetic and restorative treatments including sedation dentistry, dental crowns, dental implants and more! Our dentists focus on creating lasting relationships with our patients with honest communication, exceptional service, and high-quality dental care. We want to give you the most access to the best care that modern dentistry has to offer in a fast, convenient time frame. Make an appointment for the whole family today. You can reach our Birmingham office online, or by calling!

At Cook Family and Cosmetic Dentistry, we believe that we have achieved the perfect mix of modern, up-to-date dental treatment and good old-fashioned friendly care. You deserve the very best, and every time you call or visit our office, you will be greeted by a welcoming voice and warm smile.

Aspen Dental dentists are dedicated to making it easier to get the care you need. They believe in treating each patient like family and providing comprehensive care in a compassionate and judgment-free environment. At Aspen Dental, we've simplified everything to give you peace of mind. We make payment the easy part with transparent pricing and our commitment to everyday low prices. We offer all dental and denture services and we'll work with you on your treatment plan to find what works best for you. Our dentures are custom crafted in our on-site denture labs for speedy turnaround in as little as 24 hours and provide the most natural fit, look, and feel. We're here for you when you need us most with convenient locations and extended office hours, including evenings and select Saturdays. Scheduling an appointment is easy! You can schedule your appointment by phone Monday - Saturday, 7am - 9pm EST. Or visit us online to schedule an appointment. Emergencies and walk-ins are always welcome.

Shelby Dental Center was founded by Dr. Michael Ford in 1985. Dr. Ford wanted to create a practice that focused on offering one-day denture services. While working at his full time practice in Alabaster, he opened Shelby Denture Clinic and eventually worked full time making dentures, when he sold his Alabaster practice in 1989. Scott, Dr. Ford's son is our head dental technician. After graduating from Auburn University, he joined the family business in 1994. Scott is trained in fabrication and repair of removable dental appliances, including dentures and partial dentures. Scott either makes or directly oversees each denture that is made at Shelby Dental Center. This allows a unique consistency in quality with our dentures. Ashley, Dr. Ford's daughter has worked closely with Shelby Dental Center since her graduation from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry in 1995.

AdVance Dental is a general dentistry practice that focuses on comprehensive care and thorough patient education. We repair teeth that are in trouble, remove teeth that can't be saved, replace teeth that are missing, and improve the esthetics of teeth that don't look as good as you want. Our services include: fillings, crowns, bridges, veneers, teeth whitening, implant restorations, extractions, root canals, deep cleaning, dentures, partials, sleep apnea appliances, Botox, and more!

At Southside Family Dentistry, we value our patient relationships, making it our priority to deliver gentle compassionate care that you deserve from a dentist in Birmingham. We work hard to make you feel at ease by providing exceptional patient care in a relaxed, convenient atmosphere. We strive to develop lifelong relationships with our patients by combining the latest dental technology with a professional and compassionate staff. The result is a beautiful, healthy smile that lasts a lifetime.

At Central Avenue Dentistry we take great satisfaction in helping you maintain optimal oral health and aesthetics. Our practice is devoted to comprehensive and preventive patient care, general dental care, with a special expertise in cosmetic dentistry.Our patients are our top priority, and we strive to develop long-lasting, trusting relationships with all of our patients. Your referrals are welcome and appreciated. 
 
We look forward to seeing you and your smile!

Extensive experience, ongoing education, and state of the art technology means that you will find quality dental care at Baldone Family Dentistry. Whether you are in need of care to maintain or restore your smile and good dental health, we are a professional dental team offering the perfect blend of experience, training, and genuine care to keep you smiling for a lifetime. We are located at 511 Brookwood Boulevard in Birmingham, adjacent to Brookwood Hospital, and we are open 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. Monday through Thursday and 8 a.m. to 1 p.m. every other Friday. ABOUT OUR DOCTORS & STAFF Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., joined the practice of his father, Joseph C.Baldone, D.M.D. in 1987. "Dr. Joe" retired in 2001 after more than 45 years of practice, and was a wonderful example for his son of practicing dentistry for the life of the patient, and keeping the long term goals of the patient in mind. Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., graduated from the University of Alabama with a B.S. in Chemistry, and received his DMD degree from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry. He is currently a member of the 7th district of the Alabama and American Dental Association. He is a member of the Academy of General Dentistry and is active in two local dental study clubs. Spencer Moore, D.M.D., joined the practice in 2006. He received a B.S. degree in Biochemistry from the University of Mississippi, and his D.M.D. degree from the University of Mississippi. Our hygienists are Cindy Powers-Kidd and Julie Marsh, both with RDH licenses with the state of Alabama. Combined together, they have more than 25 years of experience in the field of dental hygiene.

Dr. Kent is a graduate of the Medical College of Virginia and the University of Alabama at Birmingham. In addition to her undergraduate and dental degree, she completed a Ph.D. in microbiology and training in periodontics. Dr. Kent is the current President of the Birmingham District Dental Society. She is also the past president of the Alabama Society of Periodontics and founder and director of the Birmingham Comprehensive Dental Seminars, which brings area dentists and dental specialists together to work on providing a comprehensive team approach to patient care. She has served on the executive council of Birmingham District Dental Society as well as the Southern Academy of Periodontics. She is also a member of the Alabama Dental Association, the American Dental Association, and the American Academy of Periodontology. She is the leadership liaison for Alabama to the American Academy of Periodontology.When you visit our Homewood office, your smile is always our top priority. Our entire team is dedicated to providing you with the personalized, gentle care that you deserve.

At Spink Dentistry, we consider ourselves a partner in your health care and we strive to offer the best dentistry possible in a warm, relaxing environment. WELCOME TO OAK MOUNTAIN ORTHODONTICS Orthodontist Priscila Denny, DMD and her expert orthodontic team provide you with a fun, comfortable environment in which to obtain top-notch orthodontic care. Our Birmingham orthodontic office serves the areas of Birmingham, Riverchase, and Pelham at 2029 Old Montgomery Highway, only minutes from Riverchase Middle and Elementary Schools. Our Helena orthodontic office also serves Helena and Alabaster areas at 4730 Highway 17, next to Publix and close to Helena Middle and Intermediate Schools.

We make high quality dental care convenient and affordable at our Vital Smiles office located near you. Our friendly and experienced dental professionals provide a wide range of family dental services including orthodontics, cosmetic dentistry and emergency dental care. Our general dentists, specialists and hygienists are all under one roof. Which means that treatment for implants, braces, or periodontal care can take place in the same office. Here, we gladly treat patients of all ages, including young children. We also welcome walk-ins, offer evening and weekend appointments, and accept a variety of dental plans including Medicaid and ALL Kids. FREE exams and x-rays for new patients.

Alabama Dental Associates is a full-service clinic located in Irondale, Ala. It offers oral hygiene care, dental cleaning, sealants, bonding, fillings, sedation dentistry, crowns/bridges, tooth extractions, wisdom tooth extractions, root canal treatment and dental implants. In addition, it offers dentures, nightguards/mouthguards, tooth whitening, orthodontics/retainers, veneers/lumineers, X-rays and computerized shade matching. In addition to this, Alabama Dental Associates performs tooth extraction due to severe decay and treats advanced periodontal diseases, infections, orthodontic corrections, fractured teeth/roots. Some of the orthodontic braces available include Damon bracket, ceramic tooth colored bracket, clear braces and metal braces.

Aspen Dental dentists are dedicated to making it easier to get the care you need. They believe in treating each patient like family and providing comprehensive care in a compassionate and judgment-free environment. At Aspen Dental, we've simplified everything to give you peace of mind. We make payment the easy part with transparent pricing and our commitment to everyday low prices. We offer all dental and denture services and we'll work with you on your treatment plan to find what works best for you. Our dentures are custom crafted in our on-site denture labs for speedy turnaround in as little as 24 hours and provide the most natural fit, look, and feel. We're here for you when you need us most with convenient locations and extended office hours, including evenings and select Saturdays. Scheduling an appointment is easy! You can schedule your appointment by phone Monday - Saturday, 7am - 9pm EST. Or visit us online to schedule an appointment. Emergencies and walk-ins are always welcome.

Shelby Dental Center was founded by Dr. Michael Ford in 1985. Dr. Ford wanted to create a practice that focused on offering one-day denture services. While working at his full time practice in Alabaster, he opened Shelby Denture Clinic and eventually worked full time making dentures, when he sold his Alabaster practice in 1989. Scott, Dr. Ford's son is our head dental technician. After graduating from Auburn University, he joined the family business in 1994. Scott is trained in fabrication and repair of removable dental appliances, including dentures and partial dentures. Scott either makes or directly oversees each denture that is made at Shelby Dental Center. This allows a unique consistency in quality with our dentures. Ashley, Dr. Ford's daughter has worked closely with Shelby Dental Center since her graduation from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry in 1995.

AdVance Dental is a general dentistry practice that focuses on comprehensive care and thorough patient education. We repair teeth that are in trouble, remove teeth that can't be saved, replace teeth that are missing, and improve the esthetics of teeth that don't look as good as you want. Our services include: fillings, crowns, bridges, veneers, teeth whitening, implant restorations, extractions, root canals, deep cleaning, dentures, partials, sleep apnea appliances, Botox, and more!

At Southside Family Dentistry, we value our patient relationships, making it our priority to deliver gentle compassionate care that you deserve from a dentist in Birmingham. We work hard to make you feel at ease by providing exceptional patient care in a relaxed, convenient atmosphere. We strive to develop lifelong relationships with our patients by combining the latest dental technology with a professional and compassionate staff. The result is a beautiful, healthy smile that lasts a lifetime.

At Central Avenue Dentistry we take great satisfaction in helping you maintain optimal oral health and aesthetics. Our practice is devoted to comprehensive and preventive patient care, general dental care, with a special expertise in cosmetic dentistry.Our patients are our top priority, and we strive to develop long-lasting, trusting relationships with all of our patients. Your referrals are welcome and appreciated. 
 
We look forward to seeing you and your smile!

Extensive experience, ongoing education, and state of the art technology means that you will find quality dental care at Baldone Family Dentistry. Whether you are in need of care to maintain or restore your smile and good dental health, we are a professional dental team offering the perfect blend of experience, training, and genuine care to keep you smiling for a lifetime. We are located at 511 Brookwood Boulevard in Birmingham, adjacent to Brookwood Hospital, and we are open 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. Monday through Thursday and 8 a.m. to 1 p.m. every other Friday. ABOUT OUR DOCTORS & STAFF Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., joined the practice of his father, Joseph C.Baldone, D.M.D. in 1987. "Dr. Joe" retired in 2001 after more than 45 years of practice, and was a wonderful example for his son of practicing dentistry for the life of the patient, and keeping the long term goals of the patient in mind. Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., graduated from the University of Alabama with a B.S. in Chemistry, and received his DMD degree from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry. He is currently a member of the 7th district of the Alabama and American Dental Association. He is a member of the Academy of General Dentistry and is active in two local dental study clubs. Spencer Moore, D.M.D., joined the practice in 2006. He received a B.S. degree in Biochemistry from the University of Mississippi, and his D.M.D. degree from the University of Mississippi. Our hygienists are Cindy Powers-Kidd and Julie Marsh, both with RDH licenses with the state of Alabama. Combined together, they have more than 25 years of experience in the field of dental hygiene.

Dr. Kent is a graduate of the Medical College of Virginia and the University of Alabama at Birmingham. In addition to her undergraduate and dental degree, she completed a Ph.D. in microbiology and training in periodontics. Dr. Kent is the current President of the Birmingham District Dental Society. She is also the past president of the Alabama Society of Periodontics and founder and director of the Birmingham Comprehensive Dental Seminars, which brings area dentists and dental specialists together to work on providing a comprehensive team approach to patient care. She has served on the executive council of Birmingham District Dental Society as well as the Southern Academy of Periodontics. She is also a member of the Alabama Dental Association, the American Dental Association, and the American Academy of Periodontology. She is the leadership liaison for Alabama to the American Academy of Periodontology.When you visit our Homewood office, your smile is always our top priority. Our entire team is dedicated to providing you with the personalized, gentle care that you deserve.

Extensive experience, ongoing education, and state of the art technology means that you will find quality dental care at Baldone Family Dentistry. Whether you are in need of care to maintain or restore your smile and good dental health, we are a professional dental team offering the perfect blend of experience, training, and genuine care to keep you smiling for a lifetime. We are located at 511 Brookwood Boulevard in Birmingham, adjacent to Brookwood Hospital, and we are open 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. Monday through Thursday and 8 a.m. to 1 p.m. every other Friday. ABOUT OUR DOCTORS & STAFF Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., joined the practice of his father, Joseph C.Baldone, D.M.D. in 1987. "Dr. Joe" retired in 2001 after more than 45 years of practice, and was a wonderful example for his son of practicing dentistry for the life of the patient, and keeping the long term goals of the patient in mind. Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., graduated from the University of Alabama with a B.S. in Chemistry, and received his DMD degree from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry. He is currently a member of the 7th district of the Alabama and American Dental Association. He is a member of the Academy of General Dentistry and is active in two local dental study clubs. Spencer Moore, D.M.D., joined the practice in 2006. He received a B.S. degree in Biochemistry from the University of Mississippi, and his D.M.D. degree from the University of Mississippi. Our hygienists are Cindy Powers-Kidd and Julie Marsh, both with RDH licenses with the state of Alabama. Combined together, they have more than 25 years of experience in the field of dental hygiene.

Dr. Kent is a graduate of the Medical College of Virginia and the University of Alabama at Birmingham. In addition to her undergraduate and dental degree, she completed a Ph.D. in microbiology and training in periodontics. Dr. Kent is the current President of the Birmingham District Dental Society. She is also the past president of the Alabama Society of Periodontics and founder and director of the Birmingham Comprehensive Dental Seminars, which brings area dentists and dental specialists together to work on providing a comprehensive team approach to patient care. She has served on the executive council of Birmingham District Dental Society as well as the Southern Academy of Periodontics. She is also a member of the Alabama Dental Association, the American Dental Association, and the American Academy of Periodontology. She is the leadership liaison for Alabama to the American Academy of Periodontology.When you visit our Homewood office, your smile is always our top priority. Our entire team is dedicated to providing you with the personalized, gentle care that you deserve.

Shelby Dental Center was founded by Dr. Michael Ford in 1985. Dr. Ford wanted to create a practice that focused on offering one-day denture services. Scott, Dr. Ford's son is our head dental technician. After graduating from Auburn University, he joined the family business in 1994. Scott is trained in fabrication and repair of removable dental appliances, including dentures and partial dentures. Scott either makes or directly oversees each denture that is made at Shelby Dental Center. This allows a unique consistency in quality with our dentures. Ashley, Dr. Ford's daughter has worked closely with Shelby Dental Center since her graduation from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry in 1995.

Shelby Dental Center was founded by Dr. Michael Ford in 1985. Dr. Ford wanted to create a practice that focused on offering one-day denture services. While working at his full time practice in Alabaster, he opened Shelby Denture Clinic and eventually worked full time making dentures, when he sold his Alabaster practice in 1989. Scott, Dr. Ford's son is our head dental technician. After graduating from Auburn University, he joined the family business in 1994. Scott is trained in fabrication and repair of removable dental appliances, including dentures and partial dentures. Scott either makes or directly oversees each denture that is made at Shelby Dental Center. This allows a unique consistency in quality with our dentures. Ashley, Dr. Ford's daughter has worked closely with Shelby Dental Center since her graduation from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry in 1995.

Extensive experience, ongoing education, and state of the art technology means that you will find quality dental care at Baldone Family Dentistry. Whether you are in need of care to maintain or restore your smile and good dental health, we are a professional dental team offering the perfect blend of experience, training, and genuine care to keep you smiling for a lifetime. We are located at 511 Brookwood Boulevard in Birmingham, adjacent to Brookwood Hospital, and we are open 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. Monday through Thursday and 8 a.m. to 1 p.m. every other Friday. ABOUT OUR DOCTORS & STAFF Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., joined the practice of his father, Joseph C.Baldone, D.M.D. in 1987. "Dr. Joe" retired in 2001 after more than 45 years of practice, and was a wonderful example for his son of practicing dentistry for the life of the patient, and keeping the long term goals of the patient in mind. Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., graduated from the University of Alabama with a B.S. in Chemistry, and received his DMD degree from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry. He is currently a member of the 7th district of the Alabama and American Dental Association. He is a member of the Academy of General Dentistry and is active in two local dental study clubs. Spencer Moore, D.M.D., joined the practice in 2006. He received a B.S. degree in Biochemistry from the University of Mississippi, and his D.M.D. degree from the University of Mississippi. Our hygienists are Cindy Powers-Kidd and Julie Marsh, both with RDH licenses with the state of Alabama. Combined together, they have more than 25 years of experience in the field of dental hygiene.

Dr. Kent is a graduate of the Medical College of Virginia and the University of Alabama at Birmingham. In addition to her undergraduate and dental degree, she completed a Ph.D. in microbiology and training in periodontics. Dr. Kent is the current President of the Birmingham District Dental Society. She is also the past president of the Alabama Society of Periodontics and founder and director of the Birmingham Comprehensive Dental Seminars, which brings area dentists and dental specialists together to work on providing a comprehensive team approach to patient care. She has served on the executive council of Birmingham District Dental Society as well as the Southern Academy of Periodontics. She is also a member of the Alabama Dental Association, the American Dental Association, and the American Academy of Periodontology. She is the leadership liaison for Alabama to the American Academy of Periodontology.When you visit our Homewood office, your smile is always our top priority. Our entire team is dedicated to providing you with the personalized, gentle care that you deserve.

Shelby Dental Center was founded by Dr. Michael Ford in 1985. Dr. Ford wanted to create a practice that focused on offering one-day denture services. Scott, Dr. Ford's son is our head dental technician. After graduating from Auburn University, he joined the family business in 1994. Scott is trained in fabrication and repair of removable dental appliances, including dentures and partial dentures. Scott either makes or directly oversees each denture that is made at Shelby Dental Center. This allows a unique consistency in quality with our dentures. Ashley, Dr. Ford's daughter has worked closely with Shelby Dental Center since her graduation from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry in 1995.

Extensive experience, ongoing education, and state of the art technology means that you will find quality dental care at Baldone Family Dentistry. We are located at 511 Brookwood Boulevard in Birmingham, adjacent to Brookwood Hospital, and we are open 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. Monday through Thursday and 8 a.m. to 1 p.m. every other Friday. ABOUT OUR DOCTORS & STAFF Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., joined the practice of his father, Joseph C.Baldone, D.M.D. in 1987. "Dr. Joe" retired in 2001 after more than 45 years of practice, and was a wonderful example for his son of practicing dentistry for the life of the patient, and keeping the long term goals of the patient in mind. Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., graduated from the University of Alabama with a B.S. in Chemistry, and received his DMD degree from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry. He is currently a member of the 7th district of the Alabama and American Dental Association. He is a member of the Academy of General Dentistry and is active in two local dental study clubs. Spencer Moore, D.M.D., joined the practice in 2006. He received a B.S. degree in Biochemistry from the University of Mississippi, and his D.M.D. degree from the University of Mississippi. Our hygienists are Cindy Powers-Kidd and Julie Marsh, both with RDH licenses with the state of Alabama. Combined together, they have more than 25 years of experience in the field of dental hygiene.

Dr. Kent is a graduate of the Medical College of Virginia and the University of Alabama at Birmingham. In addition to her undergraduate and dental degree, she completed a Ph.D. in microbiology and training in periodontics. Dr. Kent is the current President of the Birmingham District Dental Society. She is also the past president of the Alabama Society of Periodontics and founder and director of the Birmingham Comprehensive Dental Seminars, which brings area dentists and dental specialists together to work on providing a comprehensive team approach to patient care. She has served on the executive council of Birmingham District Dental Society as well as the Southern Academy of Periodontics. She is also a member of the Alabama Dental Association, the American Dental Association, and the American Academy of Periodontology. She is the leadership liaison for Alabama to the American Academy of Periodontology.When you visit our Homewood office, your smile is always our top priority. Our entire team is dedicated to providing you with the personalized, gentle care that you deserve.

Extensive experience, ongoing education, and state of the art technology means that you will find quality dental care at Baldone Family Dentistry. We are located at 511 Brookwood Boulevard in Birmingham, adjacent to Brookwood Hospital, and we are open 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. Monday through Thursday and 8 a.m. to 1 p.m. every other Friday. ABOUT OUR DOCTORS & STAFF Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., joined the practice of his father, Joseph C.Baldone, D.M.D. in 1987. "Dr. Joe" retired in 2001 after more than 45 years of practice, and was a wonderful example for his son of practicing dentistry for the life of the patient, and keeping the long term goals of the patient in mind. Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., graduated from the University of Alabama with a B.S. in Chemistry, and received his DMD degree from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry. He is currently a member of the 7th district of the Alabama and American Dental Association. He is a member of the Academy of General Dentistry and is active in two local dental study clubs. Spencer Moore, D.M.D., joined the practice in 2006. He received a B.S. degree in Biochemistry from the University of Mississippi, and his D.M.D. degree from the University of Mississippi. Our hygienists are Cindy Powers-Kidd and Julie Marsh, both with RDH licenses with the state of Alabama. Combined together, they have more than 25 years of experience in the field of dental hygiene.

Dr. Kent is a graduate of the Medical College of Virginia and the University of Alabama at Birmingham. In addition to her undergraduate and dental degree, she completed a Ph.D. in microbiology and training in periodontics. Dr. Kent is the current President of the Birmingham District Dental Society. She is also the past president of the Alabama Society of Periodontics and founder and director of the Birmingham Comprehensive Dental Seminars, which brings area dentists and dental specialists together to work on providing a comprehensive team approach to patient care. She has served on the executive council of Birmingham District Dental Society as well as the Southern Academy of Periodontics. She is also a member of the Alabama Dental Association, the American Dental Association, and the American Academy of Periodontology. She is the leadership liaison for Alabama to the American Academy of Periodontology.When you visit our Homewood office, your smile is always our top priority. Our entire team is dedicated to providing you with the personalized, gentle care that you deserve.

ABOUT OUR DOCTORS & STAFF Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., joined the practice of his father, Joseph C.Baldone, D.M.D. in 1987. "Dr. Joe" retired in 2001 after more than 45 years of practice, and was a wonderful example for his son of practicing dentistry for the life of the patient, and keeping the long term goals of the patient in mind. Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., graduated from the University of Alabama with a B.S. in Chemistry, and received his DMD degree from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry. He is currently a member of the 7th district of the Alabama and American Dental Association. He is a member of the Academy of General Dentistry and is active in two local dental study clubs. Spencer Moore, D.M.D., joined the practice in 2006. He received a B.S. degree in Biochemistry from the University of Mississippi, and his D.M.D. degree from the University of Mississippi. Our hygienists are Cindy Powers-Kidd and Julie Marsh, both with RDH licenses with the state of Alabama. Combined together, they have more than 25 years of experience in the field of dental hygiene.

Dr. Kent is a graduate of the Medical College of Virginia and the University of Alabama at Birmingham. In addition to her undergraduate and dental degree, she completed a Ph.D. in microbiology and training in periodontics. Dr. Kent is the current President of the Birmingham District Dental Society. She is also the past president of the Alabama Society of Periodontics and founder and director of the Birmingham Comprehensive Dental Seminars, which brings area dentists and dental specialists together to work on providing a comprehensive team approach to patient care. She has served on the executive council of Birmingham District Dental Society as well as the Southern Academy of Periodontics. She is also a member of the Alabama Dental Association, the American Dental Association, and the American Academy of Periodontology. She is the leadership liaison for Alabama to the American Academy of Periodontology.When you visit our Homewood office, your smile is always our top priority. Our entire team is dedicated to providing you with the personalized, gentle care that you deserve.

Alabama Dental Associates is a full-service clinic located in Irondale, Ala. In addition, it offers dentures, nightguards/mouthguards, tooth whitening, orthodontics/retainers, veneers/lumineers, X-rays and computerized shade matching. Shelby Dental Center was founded by Dr. Michael Ford in 1985. Dr. Ford wanted to create a practice that focused on offering one-day denture services. While working at his full time practice in Alabaster, he opened Shelby Denture Clinic and eventually worked full time making dentures, when he sold his Alabaster practice in 1989. Scott, Dr. Ford's son is our head dental technician. After graduating from Auburn University, he joined the family business in 1994. Scott is trained in fabrication and repair of removable dental appliances, including dentures and partial dentures. Scott either makes or directly oversees each denture that is made at Shelby Dental Center. This allows a unique consistency in quality with our dentures. Ashley, Dr. Ford's daughter has worked closely with Shelby Dental Center since her graduation from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry in 1995.

Extensive experience, ongoing education, and state of the art technology means that you will find quality dental care at Baldone Family Dentistry. We are located at 511 Brookwood Boulevard in Birmingham, adjacent to Brookwood Hospital, and we are open 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. Monday through Thursday and 8 a.m. to 1 p.m. every other Friday. ABOUT OUR DOCTORS & STAFF Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., joined the practice of his father, Joseph C.Baldone, D.M.D. in 1987. "Dr. Joe" retired in 2001 after more than 45 years of practice, and was a wonderful example for his son of practicing dentistry for the life of the patient, and keeping the long term goals of the patient in mind. Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., graduated from the University of Alabama with a B.S. in Chemistry, and received his DMD degree from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry. He is currently a member of the 7th district of the Alabama and American Dental Association. He is a member of the Academy of General Dentistry and is active in two local dental study clubs. Spencer Moore, D.M.D., joined the practice in 2006. He received a B.S. degree in Biochemistry from the University of Mississippi, and his D.M.D. degree from the University of Mississippi. Our hygienists are Cindy Powers-Kidd and Julie Marsh, both with RDH licenses with the state of Alabama. Combined together, they have more than 25 years of experience in the field of dental hygiene.

Dr. Kent is a graduate of the Medical College of Virginia and the University of Alabama at Birmingham. In addition to her undergraduate and dental degree, she completed a Ph.D. in microbiology and training in periodontics. Dr. Kent is the current President of the Birmingham District Dental Society. She is also the past president of the Alabama Society of Periodontics and founder and director of the Birmingham Comprehensive Dental Seminars, which brings area dentists and dental specialists together to work on providing a comprehensive team approach to patient care. She has served on the executive council of Birmingham District Dental Society as well as the Southern Academy of Periodontics. She is also a member of the Alabama Dental Association, the American Dental Association, and the American Academy of Periodontology. She is the leadership liaison for Alabama to the American Academy of Periodontology.When you visit our Homewood office, your smile is always our top priority. Our entire team is dedicated to providing you with the personalized, gentle care that you deserve.

Shelby Dental Center was founded by Dr. Michael Ford in 1985. Dr. Ford wanted to create a practice that focused on offering one-day denture services. While working at his full time practice in Alabaster, he opened Shelby Denture Clinic and eventually worked full time making dentures, when he sold his Alabaster practice in 1989. Scott, Dr. Ford's son is our head dental technician. After graduating from Auburn University, he joined the family business in 1994. Scott is trained in fabrication and repair of removable dental appliances, including dentures and partial dentures. Scott either makes or directly oversees each denture that is made at Shelby Dental Center. This allows a unique consistency in quality with our dentures. Ashley, Dr. Ford's daughter has worked closely with Shelby Dental Center since her graduation from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry in 1995.

Extensive experience, ongoing education, and state of the art technology means that you will find quality dental care at Baldone Family Dentistry. Whether you are in need of care to maintain or restore your smile and good dental health, we are a professional dental team offering the perfect blend of experience, training, and genuine care to keep you smiling for a lifetime. We are located at 511 Brookwood Boulevard in Birmingham, adjacent to Brookwood Hospital, and we are open 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. Monday through Thursday and 8 a.m. to 1 p.m. every other Friday. ABOUT OUR DOCTORS & STAFF Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., joined the practice of his father, Joseph C.Baldone, D.M.D. in 1987. "Dr. Joe" retired in 2001 after more than 45 years of practice, and was a wonderful example for his son of practicing dentistry for the life of the patient, and keeping the long term goals of the patient in mind. Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., graduated from the University of Alabama with a B.S. in Chemistry, and received his DMD degree from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry. He is currently a member of the 7th district of the Alabama and American Dental Association. He is a member of the Academy of General Dentistry and is active in two local dental study clubs. Spencer Moore, D.M.D., joined the practice in 2006. He received a B.S. degree in Biochemistry from the University of Mississippi, and his D.M.D. degree from the University of Mississippi. Our hygienists are Cindy Powers-Kidd and Julie Marsh, both with RDH licenses with the state of Alabama. Combined together, they have more than 25 years of experience in the field of dental hygiene.

Dr. Kent is a graduate of the Medical College of Virginia and the University of Alabama at Birmingham. In addition to her undergraduate and dental degree, she completed a Ph.D. in microbiology and training in periodontics. Dr. Kent is the current President of the Birmingham District Dental Society. She is also the past president of the Alabama Society of Periodontics and founder and director of the Birmingham Comprehensive Dental Seminars, which brings area dentists and dental specialists together to work on providing a comprehensive team approach to patient care. She has served on the executive council of Birmingham District Dental Society as well as the Southern Academy of Periodontics. She is also a member of the Alabama Dental Association, the American Dental Association, and the American Academy of Periodontology. She is the leadership liaison for Alabama to the American Academy of Periodontology.When you visit our Homewood office, your smile is always our top priority. Our entire team is dedicated to providing you with the personalized, gentle care that you deserve.

Shelby Dental Center was founded by Dr. Michael Ford in 1985. Dr. Ford wanted to create a practice that focused on offering one-day denture services. Extensive experience, ongoing education, and state of the art technology means that you will find quality dental care at Baldone Family Dentistry. Whether you are in need of care to maintain or restore your smile and good dental health, we are a professional dental team offering the perfect blend of experience, training, and genuine care to keep you smiling for a lifetime. We are located at 511 Brookwood Boulevard in Birmingham, adjacent to Brookwood Hospital, and we are open 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. Monday through Thursday and 8 a.m. to 1 p.m. every other Friday. ABOUT OUR DOCTORS & STAFF Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., joined the practice of his father, Joseph C.Baldone, D.M.D. in 1987. "Dr. Joe" retired in 2001 after more than 45 years of practice, and was a wonderful example for his son of practicing dentistry for the life of the patient, and keeping the long term goals of the patient in mind. Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., graduated from the University of Alabama with a B.S. in Chemistry, and received his DMD degree from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry. He is currently a member of the 7th district of the Alabama and American Dental Association. He is a member of the Academy of General Dentistry and is active in two local dental study clubs. Spencer Moore, D.M.D., joined the practice in 2006. He received a B.S. degree in Biochemistry from the University of Mississippi, and his D.M.D. degree from the University of Mississippi. Our hygienists are Cindy Powers-Kidd and Julie Marsh, both with RDH licenses with the state of Alabama. Combined together, they have more than 25 years of experience in the field of dental hygiene.

Dr. Kent is a graduate of the Medical College of Virginia and the University of Alabama at Birmingham. In addition to her undergraduate and dental degree, she completed a Ph.D. in microbiology and training in periodontics. Dr. Kent is the current President of the Birmingham District Dental Society. She is also the past president of the Alabama Society of Periodontics and founder and director of the Birmingham Comprehensive Dental Seminars, which brings area dentists and dental specialists together to work on providing a comprehensive team approach to patient care. She has served on the executive council of Birmingham District Dental Society as well as the Southern Academy of Periodontics. She is also a member of the Alabama Dental Association, the American Dental Association, and the American Academy of Periodontology. She is the leadership liaison for Alabama to the American Academy of Periodontology.When you visit our Homewood office, your smile is always our top priority. Our entire team is dedicated to providing you with the personalized, gentle care that you deserve.

AdVance Dental is a general dentistry practice that focuses on comprehensive care and thorough patient education. At Central Avenue Dentistry we take great satisfaction in helping you maintain optimal oral health and aesthetics. Extensive experience, ongoing education, and state of the art technology means that you will find quality dental care at Baldone Family Dentistry. Whether you are in need of care to maintain or restore your smile and good dental health, we are a professional dental team offering the perfect blend of experience, training, and genuine care to keep you smiling for a lifetime. We are located at 511 Brookwood Boulevard in Birmingham, adjacent to Brookwood Hospital, and we are open 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. Monday through Thursday and 8 a.m. to 1 p.m. every other Friday. ABOUT OUR DOCTORS & STAFF Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., joined the practice of his father, Joseph C.Baldone, D.M.D. in 1987. "Dr. Joe" retired in 2001 after more than 45 years of practice, and was a wonderful example for his son of practicing dentistry for the life of the patient, and keeping the long term goals of the patient in mind. Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., graduated from the University of Alabama with a B.S. in Chemistry, and received his DMD degree from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry. He is currently a member of the 7th district of the Alabama and American Dental Association. He is a member of the Academy of General Dentistry and is active in two local dental study clubs. Spencer Moore, D.M.D., joined the practice in 2006. He received a B.S. degree in Biochemistry from the University of Mississippi, and his D.M.D. degree from the University of Mississippi. Our hygienists are Cindy Powers-Kidd and Julie Marsh, both with RDH licenses with the state of Alabama. Combined together, they have more than 25 years of experience in the field of dental hygiene.

Dr. Kent is a graduate of the Medical College of Virginia and the University of Alabama at Birmingham. In addition to her undergraduate and dental degree, she completed a Ph.D. in microbiology and training in periodontics. Dr. Kent is the current President of the Birmingham District Dental Society. She is also the past president of the Alabama Society of Periodontics and founder and director of the Birmingham Comprehensive Dental Seminars, which brings area dentists and dental specialists together to work on providing a comprehensive team approach to patient care. She has served on the executive council of Birmingham District Dental Society as well as the Southern Academy of Periodontics. She is also a member of the Alabama Dental Association, the American Dental Association, and the American Academy of Periodontology. She is the leadership liaison for Alabama to the American Academy of Periodontology.When you visit our Homewood office, your smile is always our top priority. Our entire team is dedicated to providing you with the personalized, gentle care that you deserve.

Shelby Dental Center was founded by Dr. Michael Ford in 1985. Dr. Ford wanted to create a practice that focused on offering one-day denture services. While working at his full time practice in Alabaster, he opened Shelby Denture Clinic and eventually worked full time making dentures, when he sold his Alabaster practice in 1989. Scott, Dr. Ford's son is our head dental technician. After graduating from Auburn University, he joined the family business in 1994. Scott is trained in fabrication and repair of removable dental appliances, including dentures and partial dentures. Scott either makes or directly oversees each denture that is made at Shelby Dental Center. This allows a unique consistency in quality with our dentures. Ashley, Dr. Ford's daughter has worked closely with Shelby Dental Center since her graduation from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry in 1995.

Whether it has just been a while since your last check-up or you want to help a loved one improve their smile, we will be glad to assist you with appointments Monday through Friday with same day emergency appointments available..  We offer Single Visit Dentistry that ranges from 3M Composite "no metal" fillings to CEREC digital CAD/CAM crowns, veneers and bridges, root canal therapy, implant restorations and oral surgery. Dr. Cole also can help manage medical issues utilizing TMJ appliances, Botox and C-PAP alternatives. He also provides cosmetic tooth straightening using Invisalign aligners and ZOOM! Whitening.  If you are apprehensive about receiving dental treatment, we offer oral sedation as well as nitrous oxide for a comfortable visit. You may also enjoy satellite television through out the entire office.  If you have questions about your teeth or would just like a "second" opinion before initiating treatment, we welcome your call. Using our wireless intra oral cameras, you can see what we see conveniently on our television monitors. We proudly offer a Limited Warranty with our dentistry.

Extensive experience, ongoing education, and state of the art technology means that you will find quality dental care at Baldone Family Dentistry. Whether you are in need of care to maintain or restore your smile and good dental health, we are a professional dental team offering the perfect blend of experience, training, and genuine care to keep you smiling for a lifetime. We are located at 511 Brookwood Boulevard in Birmingham, adjacent to Brookwood Hospital, and we are open 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. Monday through Thursday and 8 a.m. to 1 p.m. every other Friday. ABOUT OUR DOCTORS & STAFF Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., joined the practice of his father, Joseph C.Baldone, D.M.D. in 1987. "Dr. Joe" retired in 2001 after more than 45 years of practice, and was a wonderful example for his son of practicing dentistry for the life of the patient, and keeping the long term goals of the patient in mind. Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., graduated from the University of Alabama with a B.S. in Chemistry, and received his DMD degree from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry. He is currently a member of the 7th district of the Alabama and American Dental Association. He is a member of the Academy of General Dentistry and is active in two local dental study clubs. Spencer Moore, D.M.D., joined the practice in 2006. He received a B.S. degree in Biochemistry from the University of Mississippi, and his D.M.D. degree from the University of Mississippi. Our hygienists are Cindy Powers-Kidd and Julie Marsh, both with RDH licenses with the state of Alabama. Combined together, they have more than 25 years of experience in the field of dental hygiene.

Dr. Kent is a graduate of the Medical College of Virginia and the University of Alabama at Birmingham. In addition to her undergraduate and dental degree, she completed a Ph.D. in microbiology and training in periodontics. Dr. Kent is the current President of the Birmingham District Dental Society. She is also the past president of the Alabama Society of Periodontics and founder and director of the Birmingham Comprehensive Dental Seminars, which brings area dentists and dental specialists together to work on providing a comprehensive team approach to patient care. She has served on the executive council of Birmingham District Dental Society as well as the Southern Academy of Periodontics. She is also a member of the Alabama Dental Association, the American Dental Association, and the American Academy of Periodontology. She is the leadership liaison for Alabama to the American Academy of Periodontology.When you visit our Homewood office, your smile is always our top priority. Our entire team is dedicated to providing you with the personalized, gentle care that you deserve.

Shelby Dental Center was founded by Dr. Michael Ford in 1985. Dr. Ford wanted to create a practice that focused on offering one-day denture services. While working at his full time practice in Alabaster, he opened Shelby Denture Clinic and eventually worked full time making dentures, when he sold his Alabaster practice in 1989. Scott, Dr. Ford's son is our head dental technician. After graduating from Auburn University, he joined the family business in 1994. Scott is trained in fabrication and repair of removable dental appliances, including dentures and partial dentures. Scott either makes or directly oversees each denture that is made at Shelby Dental Center. This allows a unique consistency in quality with our dentures. Ashley, Dr. Ford's daughter has worked closely with Shelby Dental Center since her graduation from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry in 1995.

Whether it has just been a while since your last check-up or you want to help a loved one improve their smile, we will be glad to assist you with appointments Monday through Friday with same day emergency appointments available.. Extensive experience, ongoing education, and state of the art technology means that you will find quality dental care at Baldone Family Dentistry. Whether you are in need of care to maintain or restore your smile and good dental health, we are a professional dental team offering the perfect blend of experience, training, and genuine care to keep you smiling for a lifetime. We are located at 511 Brookwood Boulevard in Birmingham, adjacent to Brookwood Hospital, and we are open 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. Monday through Thursday and 8 a.m. to 1 p.m. every other Friday. ABOUT OUR DOCTORS & STAFF Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., joined the practice of his father, Joseph C.Baldone, D.M.D. in 1987. "Dr. Joe" retired in 2001 after more than 45 years of practice, and was a wonderful example for his son of practicing dentistry for the life of the patient, and keeping the long term goals of the patient in mind. Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., graduated from the University of Alabama with a B.S. in Chemistry, and received his DMD degree from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry. He is currently a member of the 7th district of the Alabama and American Dental Association. He is a member of the Academy of General Dentistry and is active in two local dental study clubs. Spencer Moore, D.M.D., joined the practice in 2006. He received a B.S. degree in Biochemistry from the University of Mississippi, and his D.M.D. degree from the University of Mississippi. Our hygienists are Cindy Powers-Kidd and Julie Marsh, both with RDH licenses with the state of Alabama. Combined together, they have more than 25 years of experience in the field of dental hygiene.

Dr. Kent is a graduate of the Medical College of Virginia and the University of Alabama at Birmingham. In addition to her undergraduate and dental degree, she completed a Ph.D. in microbiology and training in periodontics. Dr. Kent is the current President of the Birmingham District Dental Society. She is also the past president of the Alabama Society of Periodontics and founder and director of the Birmingham Comprehensive Dental Seminars, which brings area dentists and dental specialists together to work on providing a comprehensive team approach to patient care. She has served on the executive council of Birmingham District Dental Society as well as the Southern Academy of Periodontics. She is also a member of the Alabama Dental Association, the American Dental Association, and the American Academy of Periodontology. She is the leadership liaison for Alabama to the American Academy of Periodontology.When you visit our Homewood office, your smile is always our top priority. Our entire team is dedicated to providing you with the personalized, gentle care that you deserve.

Shelby Dental Center was founded by Dr. Michael Ford in 1985. Dr. Ford wanted to create a practice that focused on offering one-day denture services. While working at his full time practice in Alabaster, he opened Shelby Denture Clinic and eventually worked full time making dentures, when he sold his Alabaster practice in 1989. Scott, Dr. Ford's son is our head dental technician. After graduating from Auburn University, he joined the family business in 1994. Scott is trained in fabrication and repair of removable dental appliances, including dentures and partial dentures. Scott either makes or directly oversees each denture that is made at Shelby Dental Center. This allows a unique consistency in quality with our dentures. Ashley, Dr. Ford's daughter has worked closely with Shelby Dental Center since her graduation from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry in 1995.

Whether it has just been a while since your last check-up or you want to help a loved one improve their smile, we will be glad to assist you with appointments Monday through Friday with same day emergency appointments available.. If you are apprehensive about receiving dental treatment, we offer oral sedation as well as nitrous oxide for a comfortable visit. You may also enjoy satellite television through out the entire office.  If you have questions about your teeth or would just like a "second" opinion before initiating treatment, we welcome your call. Using our wireless intra oral cameras, you can see what we see conveniently on our television monitors. We proudly offer a Limited Warranty with our dentistry.

Extensive experience, ongoing education, and state of the art technology means that you will find quality dental care at Baldone Family Dentistry. Whether you are in need of care to maintain or restore your smile and good dental health, we are a professional dental team offering the perfect blend of experience, training, and genuine care to keep you smiling for a lifetime. We are located at 511 Brookwood Boulevard in Birmingham, adjacent to Brookwood Hospital, and we are open 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. Monday through Thursday and 8 a.m. to 1 p.m. every other Friday. ABOUT OUR DOCTORS & STAFF Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., joined the practice of his father, Joseph C.Baldone, D.M.D. in 1987. "Dr. Joe" retired in 2001 after more than 45 years of practice, and was a wonderful example for his son of practicing dentistry for the life of the patient, and keeping the long term goals of the patient in mind. Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., graduated from the University of Alabama with a B.S. in Chemistry, and received his DMD degree from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry. He is currently a member of the 7th district of the Alabama and American Dental Association. He is a member of the Academy of General Dentistry and is active in two local dental study clubs. Spencer Moore, D.M.D., joined the practice in 2006. He received a B.S. degree in Biochemistry from the University of Mississippi, and his D.M.D. degree from the University of Mississippi. Our hygienists are Cindy Powers-Kidd and Julie Marsh, both with RDH licenses with the state of Alabama. Combined together, they have more than 25 years of experience in the field of dental hygiene.

Dr. Kent is a graduate of the Medical College of Virginia and the University of Alabama at Birmingham. In addition to her undergraduate and dental degree, she completed a Ph.D. in microbiology and training in periodontics. Dr. Kent is the current President of the Birmingham District Dental Society. She is also the past president of the Alabama Society of Periodontics and founder and director of the Birmingham Comprehensive Dental Seminars, which brings area dentists and dental specialists together to work on providing a comprehensive team approach to patient care. She has served on the executive council of Birmingham District Dental Society as well as the Southern Academy of Periodontics. She is also a member of the Alabama Dental Association, the American Dental Association, and the American Academy of Periodontology. She is the leadership liaison for Alabama to the American Academy of Periodontology.When you visit our Homewood office, your smile is always our top priority. Our entire team is dedicated to providing you with the personalized, gentle care that you deserve.

Shelby Dental Center was founded by Dr. Michael Ford in 1985. Dr. Ford wanted to create a practice that focused on offering one-day denture services. While working at his full time practice in Alabaster, he opened Shelby Denture Clinic and eventually worked full time making dentures, when he sold his Alabaster practice in 1989. Scott, Dr. Ford's son is our head dental technician. After graduating from Auburn University, he joined the family business in 1994. Scott is trained in fabrication and repair of removable dental appliances, including dentures and partial dentures. Scott either makes or directly oversees each denture that is made at Shelby Dental Center. This allows a unique consistency in quality with our dentures. Ashley, Dr. Ford's daughter has worked closely with Shelby Dental Center since her graduation from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry in 1995.

Extensive experience, ongoing education, and state of the art technology means that you will find quality dental care at Baldone Family Dentistry. Whether you are in need of care to maintain or restore your smile and good dental health, we are a professional dental team offering the perfect blend of experience, training, and genuine care to keep you smiling for a lifetime. We are located at 511 Brookwood Boulevard in Birmingham, adjacent to Brookwood Hospital, and we are open 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. Monday through Thursday and 8 a.m. to 1 p.m. every other Friday. ABOUT OUR DOCTORS & STAFF Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., joined the practice of his father, Joseph C.Baldone, D.M.D. in 1987. "Dr. Joe" retired in 2001 after more than 45 years of practice, and was a wonderful example for his son of practicing dentistry for the life of the patient, and keeping the long term goals of the patient in mind. Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., graduated from the University of Alabama with a B.S. in Chemistry, and received his DMD degree from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry. He is currently a member of the 7th district of the Alabama and American Dental Association. He is a member of the Academy of General Dentistry and is active in two local dental study clubs. Spencer Moore, D.M.D., joined the practice in 2006. He received a B.S. degree in Biochemistry from the University of Mississippi, and his D.M.D. degree from the University of Mississippi. Our hygienists are Cindy Powers-Kidd and Julie Marsh, both with RDH licenses with the state of Alabama. Combined together, they have more than 25 years of experience in the field of dental hygiene.

Dr. Kent is a graduate of the Medical College of Virginia and the University of Alabama at Birmingham. In addition to her undergraduate and dental degree, she completed a Ph.D. in microbiology and training in periodontics. Dr. Kent is the current President of the Birmingham District Dental Society. She is also the past president of the Alabama Society of Periodontics and founder and director of the Birmingham Comprehensive Dental Seminars, which brings area dentists and dental specialists together to work on providing a comprehensive team approach to patient care. She has served on the executive council of Birmingham District Dental Society as well as the Southern Academy of Periodontics. She is also a member of the Alabama Dental Association, the American Dental Association, and the American Academy of Periodontology. She is the leadership liaison for Alabama to the American Academy of Periodontology.When you visit our Homewood office, your smile is always our top priority. Our entire team is dedicated to providing you with the personalized, gentle care that you deserve.

Shelby Dental Center was founded by Dr. Michael Ford in 1985. Dr. Ford wanted to create a practice that focused on offering one-day denture services. While working at his full time practice in Alabaster, he opened Shelby Denture Clinic and eventually worked full time making dentures, when he sold his Alabaster practice in 1989. Scott, Dr. Ford's son is our head dental technician. After graduating from Auburn University, he joined the family business in 1994. Scott is trained in fabrication and repair of removable dental appliances, including dentures and partial dentures. Scott either makes or directly oversees each denture that is made at Shelby Dental Center. This allows a unique consistency in quality with our dentures. Ashley, Dr. Ford's daughter has worked closely with Shelby Dental Center since her graduation from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry in 1995.

Whether it has just been a while since your last check-up or you want to help a loved one improve their smile, we will be glad to assist you with appointments Monday through Friday with same day emergency appointments available.. If you are apprehensive about receiving dental treatment, we offer oral sedation as well as nitrous oxide for a comfortable visit. "Dr. Joe" retired in 2001 after more than 45 years of practice, and was a wonderful example for his son of practicing dentistry for the life of the patient, and keeping the long term goals of the patient in mind. Charles J. Baldone, D.M.D., graduated from the University of Alabama with a B.S. in Chemistry, and received his DMD degree from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry. He is currently a member of the 7th district of the Alabama and American Dental Association. He is a member of the Academy of General Dentistry and is active in two local dental study clubs. Spencer Moore, D.M.D., joined the practice in 2006. He received a B.S. degree in Biochemistry from the University of Mississippi, and his D.M.D. degree from the University of Mississippi. Our hygienists are Cindy Powers-Kidd and Julie Marsh, both with RDH licenses with the state of Alabama. Combined together, they have more than 25 years of experience in the field of dental hygiene.

Dr. Kent is a graduate of the Medical College of Virginia and the University of Alabama at Birmingham. In addition to her undergraduate and dental degree, she completed a Ph.D. in microbiology and training in periodontics. Dr. Kent is the current President of the Birmingham District Dental Society. She is also the past president of the Alabama Society of Periodontics and founder and director of the Birmingham Comprehensive Dental Seminars, which brings area dentists and dental specialists together to work on providing a comprehensive team approach to patient care. She has served on the executive council of Birmingham District Dental Society as well as the Southern Academy of Periodontics. She is also a member of the Alabama Dental Association, the American Dental Association, and the American Academy of Periodontology. She is the leadership liaison for Alabama to the American Academy of Periodontology.When you visit our Homewood office, your smile is always our top priority. Our entire team is dedicated to providing you with the personalized, gentle care that you deserve.

Shelby Dental Center was founded by Dr. Michael Ford in 1985. Dr. Ford wanted to create a practice that focused on offering one-day denture services. While working at his full time practice in Alabaster, he opened Shelby Denture Clinic and eventually worked full time making dentures, when he sold his Alabaster practice in 1989. Scott, Dr. Ford's son is our head dental technician. After graduating from Auburn University, he joined the family business in 1994. Scott is trained in fabrication and repair of removable dental appliances, including dentures and partial dentures. Scott either makes or directly oversees each denture that is made at Shelby Dental Center. This allows a unique consistency in quality with our dentures. Ashley, Dr. Ford's daughter has worked closely with Shelby Dental Center since her graduation from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry in 1995.

In addition to her undergraduate and dental degree, she completed a Ph.D. in microbiology and training in periodontics. Dr. Kent is the current President of the Birmingham District Dental Society. She is also the past president of the Alabama Society of Periodontics and founder and director of the Birmingham Comprehensive Dental Seminars, which brings area dentists and dental specialists together to work on providing a comprehensive team approach to patient care. She has served on the executive council of Birmingham District Dental Society as well as the Southern Academy of Periodontics. She is also a member of the Alabama Dental Association, the American Dental Association, and the American Academy of Periodontology. She is the leadership liaison for Alabama to the American Academy of Periodontology.When you visit our Homewood office, your smile is always our top priority. Shelby Dental Center was founded by Dr. Michael Ford in 1985. Dr. Ford wanted to create a practice that focused on offering one-day denture services. While working at his full time practice in Alabaster, he opened Shelby Denture Clinic and eventually worked full time making dentures, when he sold his Alabaster practice in 1989. Scott, Dr. Ford's son is our head dental technician. After graduating from Auburn University, he joined the family business in 1994. Scott is trained in fabrication and repair of removable dental appliances, including dentures and partial dentures. Scott either makes or directly oversees each denture that is made at Shelby Dental Center. This allows a unique consistency in quality with our dentures. Ashley, Dr. Ford's daughter has worked closely with Shelby Dental Center since her graduation from the University of Alabama School of Dentistry in 1995.

Whether it has just been a while since your last check-up or you want to help a loved one improve their smile, we will be glad to assist you with appointments Monday through Friday with same day emergency appointments available.. Dr. Cole also can help manage medical issues utilizing TMJ appliances, Botox and C-PAP alternatives. He also provides cosmetic tooth straightening using Invisalign aligners and ZOOM! Whitening.  If you are apprehensive about receiving dental treatment, we offer oral sedation as well as nitrous oxide for a comfortable visit. You may also enjoy satellite television through out the entire office.  If you have questions about your teeth or would just like a "second" opinion before initiating treatment, we welcome your call.
